00015 #include "HouseholderQR.hpp"
00016 using namespace pwiz::math;
00017 
00018 int main()
00019 {
00020   using namespace boost::numeric::ublas;
00021   using namespace std;
00022   matrix<double> A (3,3);
00023   A(0,0) = 1;
00024   A(0,1) = 1;
00025   A(0,2) = 0;
00026   A(1,1) = 1;
00027   A(1,0) = 0;
00028   A(1,2) = 0;
00029   A(2,2) = 1;
00030   A(2,0) = 1;
00031   A(2,1) = 0; 
00032   cout << "A=" << A << endl;
00033 
00034   cout << "QR decomposition using Householder" << endl;
00035   matrix<double> Q(3,3), R(3,3);
00036   HouseholderQR (A,Q,R);
00037   matrix<double> Z = prod(Q,R) - A;
00038   float f = norm_1 (Z);
00039   cout << "Q=" << Q <<endl;
00040   cout << "R=" << R << endl;
00041   cout << "|Q*R - A|=" << f << endl;
00042 
00043   return 0;
00044 }
